SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM AS RNUM, m.userid, m.nickname, m.profileurl ,(select count(*) from FOLLOWMAPPING where userid= m.userid) as followercnt FROM MEMBERS m JOIN ( select * from FOLLOWMAPPING WHERE FWID = #{userId} AND ISDELETED = 'N') f ON m.userId = f.userId ) WHERE RNUM>#{from} AND RNUM<=#{to}

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS SEQ, A.* FROM( SELECT post.postid, post.userid, post.nickname, content, FOODNAME, post.CREATEAT, LOOKUP, count(post.postid), MAINIMAGE, MEMBERS.profileUrl, count(postlike.postid) cntlike FROM POST inner join POSTLIKE on POST.postid = POSTLIKE.POSTID inner join MEMBERS on post.userid = members.userid where POSTLIKE.ISDELETED='N' group by post.postid, post.userid, post.nickname, content, FOODNAME, post.CREATEAT, LOOKUP, MAINIMAGE, MEMBERS.profileUrl ORDER BY count(post.postid) DESC) A) WHERE SEQ> #{start} AND SEQ<= #{end}

select * FROM(SELECT ROWNUM AS SEQ, A.* FROM ( SELECT P.*, M.PROFILEURL FROM POST P inner join MEMBERS M ON P.USERID = M.USERID WHERE ISDELETED='N' ORDER BY lookup DESC) A) WHERE SEQ> #{start} AND SEQ<= #{end}
